DataElement.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Liver Volume 10Gy Irradiation Percentage Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Number value in percent of the liver tissue volume exposed to 10 Gy radiation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Radiation Therapy 10Gy Liver Volume Percent Unit Irradiation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._A triangular-shaped organ located under the diaphragm in the right hypochondrium. It is the largest internal organ of the body, weighting up to 2 kg. Metabolism and bile secretion are its main functions. It is composed of cells which have the ability to regenerate._The amount of three dimensional space occupied by an object or the capacity of a space or container._A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred)._Treated with radiation._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::10 Gy

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredName: Liver Volume Percent Unit Integer::10 Gy Irradiation
Property.preferredDefinition: A triangular-shaped organ located under the diaphragm in the right hypochondrium. It is the largest internal organ of the body, weighting up to 2 kg. Metabolism and bile secretion are its main functions. It is composed of cells which have the ability to regenerate.:The amount of three dimensional space occupied by an object or the capacity of a space or container.:A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::10 Gy:Treated with radiation.

Concepts.definition: A triangular-shaped organ located under the diaphragm in the right hypochondrium. It is the largest internal organ of the body, weighting up to 2 kg. Metabolism and bile secretion are its main functions. It is composed of cells which have the ability to regenerate.
The amount of three dimensional space occupied by an object or the capacity of a space or container.
A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: VD v1.1 replaces v1.0 with a name change.
